      • getPlayerData

        public Spectator getPlayerData(UUID id)
        Returns the object representing a player inside SpectatorPlus.
        Parameters:
        id - The player's UUID.
        Returns:
        The object. It is created on-the-fly if not already instanced, so this never returns null.

      • getPlayerData

        public Spectator getPlayerData(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Returns the object representing a player inside SpectatorPlus.
        Parameters:
        player - The player.
        Returns:
        The object. It is created on-the-fly if not already instanced, so this never returns null.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender receiver,
                        String message,
                        boolean force)
        Sends a message to the player if the messages are enabled in the config.
        Parameters:
        receiver - The recipient of the message.
        message - The message to be sent. It will be prefixed by the Spectator Plus prefix.
        force - true to send the message even if messages are not enabled.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender receiver,
                        String message)
        Sends a message to the payer if the messages are enabled in the config.
        Parameters:
        receiver - The receiver of this message.
        message - The message to be sent. It will be prefixed by the Spectator Plus prefix.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(Spectator receiver,
                        String message)
        Sends a message to the payer if the messages are enabled in the config.
        Parameters:
        receiver - The receiver of this message.
        message - The message to be sent. It will be prefixed by the Spectator Plus prefix.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(UUID id,
                        String message)
        Sends a message to the payer if the messages are enabled in the config.
        Parameters:
        id - The UUID of the receiver of this message.
        message - The message to be sent. It will be prefixed by the Spectator Plus prefix.
